statements: DELETE FROM SupplyChainData WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND producer = 'ABC Inc.';
DELETE FROM SupplyChainData WHERE id = 100 AND supplier = 'ABC Inc.';
DELETE FROM SupplyChainData WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND blockchain_hash IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM movement_tracking WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM supply_chain_data WHERE id = 100 AND supplier_name = 'Supplier A';
DELETE FROM movement_tracking WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM product_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM product_inventory WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM supply_chain_locations WHERE location_name = 'Warehouse A';
